title: 1876 Fred Andrus - CDV - Chicago White Stockings
author: pencil1974

posts.post_title: 1876 Fred Andrus - CDV - Chicago White Stockings
posts.post_content:
Cool CDV of Andrus when he played the first year the White Stockings were in the National League. The composite just shows that it is the same photo used in the CDV and is not included in the sale.

$400 Delivered PP direct or add 3% for regular paypal.

PM if interested.
